statementlist.statement: select id, shortname, longname, school_id, key1, key2, is_religion, is_language from subject
insert into subject (shortname, longname, school_id, key1, key2, is_religion, is_language) values (:shortname, :longname, :school_id, :key1, :key2, :is_religion, :is_language)
select id, shortname, longname, school_id, key1, key2, is_religion, is_language from subject where school_id = :school_id and key1 = :key1
select id, shortname, longname, school_id, key1, key2, is_religion, is_language from subject where shortname = :subjectShortname and school_id = :school_id
